Package net.delugan.teachly.exercise

Class ExerciseRequest

java.lang.Object
net.delugan.teachly.utils.DateTracked
net.delugan.teachly.utils.AuthorAndDateTracked
net.delugan.teachly.exercise.ExerciseRequest
public class ExerciseRequest extends AuthorAndDateTracked
Class representing a request to create or update an exercise. Contains all the necessary data for exercise creation or modification.
